Title: Relates to the minimum age to be able to ride in the front seat of a motor vehicle
Summary: Establishes the minimum age requirement to be able to ride in the front seat of a motor vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง1229-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a minimum age for passengers to ride in the front seat of a motor vehicle
